frontmatter.name: Shivam Sharma
frontmatter.description: Shivam is a Front End Developer. He loves to convert numbers into meaningful visual elements that are more civicly engaged. Education to underprivileged is his social motive. He likes to travel, being foodie, and watch one season a night.
